decision_conditions:
1) All tree work shall be carried out in accordance with British Standard BS 3998: Tree work: Recommendations (or an equivalent British Standard if replaced).
2) A scheme for the planting and maintenance of one Amelanchier Ballerina, Prunus sargentii Rancho, Sorbus vilmorinii, or Sorbus aucuparia Fastigiata in the front garden of 132 Fellbrigge Road, minimum size ‘feathered tree’ overall height 125 – 150 cm as specified by BS 3936 Part 1 Specification for Trees and Shrubs, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority and these works shall be carried out as approved. The works shall be carried out in the first available planting season (November – March) following the removal of the monkey puzzle tree. Variations to the species shall only be allowed if agreed beforehand and in writing with the local planning authority, and the tree planted shall be accordance with that written agreement.
3) If, within a period of five years from the date of planting, any replacement tree or any tree planted in replacement for it, is removed, uprooted, damaged, destroyed or dies, or becomes, in the opinion of the local planning authority, seriously damaged or defective, another tree of the same size and species as that originally planted shall be planted at the same place, unless the local planning authority gives its written approval to
any variation.
